snippet: Rebecca Louise Law, who works with the likes of Hermès and the V&A, shares the making of her new dried-flower installation.
abstract: Artist Rebecca Louise Law's latest floral sculpture Drying will be featured in group show at London club House of St Barnabas.
lead_paragraph: Rebecca Louise Law, who works with the likes of Hermès and the V&A, shares the making of her new dried-flower installation.

headline.main: Inside One Artist’s London Studio, Where Floral Magic Happens
